name: TWOPLASHOT
description:
A game developed by Shashank - Creator of SandS Arts.

This is a local multiplayer game (2-Players).

In this game you want to shoot at enemies, from which you obtain a crate.

From the crate you can obtain 3 items :

1.Ammo

2.Health

3.Special power by which you can shoot at the other player !

When the other player dies ,you win !!!
